name: Aohri's Uprising
description:
After a series of cataclysms, the Ahori tribe lost faith in their god.
They decided to send their fiercest warrior to put an end to his wrath.
Propelled into the divine dimension, our heroine Aohri set off armed with her bow to slay her fallen god.



Fight for survival in this third-person shooter.
Pursue a ruthless enemy in explosive battles full of twists and turns and projectiles. :

-Shoot
-Move
-Modify your shot
-Dash
-Slow down enemy projectiles

Explore a vast world full of danger:

-Towers that fire projectiles
-Platforms that break
-Trapped temple walls
-Sharp blades
-Temple axes
-Rotating blades
